description: Extract structured data from websites using AI with natural language prompts

actions.name: crawlResults
actions.description: Get the results of a crawl job.

actions.name: crawl
actions.description: Crawl multiple pages from a website based on specified rules and patterns.

actions.name: extract
actions.description: Extract structured data from multiple URLs using AI.

actions.name: map
actions.description: Input a website and get all the urls on the website.

actions.name: scrape
actions.description: Scrape a website by performing a series of actions like clicking, typing, taking screenshots, and extracting data.
